Name: Consolidated Frontline
Des: Enemies will share the damage they receive evenly to all enemies.

Name: Flame Storm
Des: Periodically summons a random Flame Storm on the battlefield, dealing DMG equal to 10% of max HP to enemies and team members.

Name: Memory Reverse
Des: Joystick direction in this battle is reversed

Name: Deadly Blade
Des: Adds 500 points of extra DMG when enemies and teammates take DMG (reduced by Resistance)

Name: Heal Infections
Des: Extra heal to enemies and team members will convert into 100% DMG

Name: Lethal Toxin
Des: All units on the battlefield will reduce HP by 2% per second and decrease heal effects by 50%

Name: Death Race
Des: Upon the death of a team member or an enemy, all the remaining units on the battlefield gain 20% all DMG and lose 20% all DMG Reduction.

Name: Signal Disruption
Des: Dodging consumes one Signal Orb. Casting a Signature Move grants one random Signal Orb.

Name: Persistent Battle
Des: Enemy and ally HP doubles, and DMG decreases by 50%

Name: Deus Ex Machina
Des: When an enemy or a team member takes lethal DMG, they will not die immediately. Instead, they receive a shield equal to their max HP, which continuously decays

Name: Final Rediance
Des: Upon your characters or enemies receiving lethal damage, they immediately restore full HP, gain huge movement speed and all DMG at the cost of losing 10% of Max HP every second.

Name: Flame Storm
Des: Periodically summons a random Flame Storm on the battlefield, dealing DMG equal to 10% of max HP to enemies and team members.

Name: ATK/DEF Force Field
Des: Summon 2 mobile Fields. ATK increases by 100% in the Attack Field, and units gain 5 stacks of DMG immunity for 60s in the Defense Field. Each effect triggers every 30s.

Name: Wheel of Fate
Des: Upon your characters or enemies receiving lethal damage, they have a 100% chance to immediately restore 50% of Max HP. Every after the effect has been triggered, the triggering chance will reduce by 30%.

Name: Memory Reverse
Des: Joystick direction in this battle is reversed

Name: Unstable Polarity
Des: All enemies are immune to damage by 1 random Signal Orb.

Name: Freeze Force Field
Des: The enemy will ignore Matrix and receives 50% extra DMG in Matrix

Name: Deadly Blade
Des: Adds 500 points of extra DMG when enemies and teammates take DMG (reduced by Resistance)

Name: Lasting Infection
Des: Enemies inflict HP Deterioration on the targets upon dealing damage to them, which will make them lose 3% of Max HP every second. This effect lasts permanently.

Name: Signal Disruption
Des: Dodging consumes one Signal Orb. Casting a Signature Move grants one random Signal Orb.

Name: Frequency Block
Des: Basic Attacks will not grant Signal Orbs. Dodging grants one Signal Orb at a time.

Name: Death Race
Des: Upon the death of a team member or an enemy, all the remaining units on the battlefield gain 20% all DMG and lose 20% all DMG Reduction.

Name: ATK/DEF Force Field
Des: Summon 2 mobile Fields. ATK increases by 100% in the Attack Field, and units gain 5 stacks of DMG immunity for 60s in the Defense Field. Each effect triggers every 30s.

Name: Self-Destruct on Death
Des: Team members and enemies self-destruct on death, dealing Fire DMG equal to 5% of max HP to surrounding targets.

Name: Unstable Polarity
Des: All enemies are immune to damage by 1 random Signal Orb.

Name: Last Stand
Des: All team members' Max HP is 1.
